member.summary: Number of items in the collection.

member.summary: Returns True if the resource database is valid.

member.name: M:StatNeth.Blaise.API.ResourceDatabase.IValidationResultCollection.Contains(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns True if the collection contains items with the specified severity.
member.param: The severity to look for: 0 = information, 1 = warning, 2 = error.
